channel.title: Any server/client I play on freezes after a few minutes! Please help?
channel.description:
Hi guys
I used to play on some priv servers over a year ago and it was fine, but I have just tried to get on them again and it is not working out I can connct ok, and play for 1 to a few minutes fine, but then it freezes and does nothing... this is with mopar and silab
I was using an older computer a few days ago with that problem, and we have now got a new computer and it is doing the same thing
Specs of new computer: AMD Athlon 64 x 2 dual core 5200+ 3GIG ram NVIDIA GEFORCE 8400gs 3d Visa home premium OS
How can this be freezing?
Any help would be much appeciated as I really would like to play or maybe create a server!
Thanks

item.title: Any server/client I play on freezes after a few minutes! Please help?
item.dc:creator: @misterkilla misterkilla
item.description:
@misterkilla wrote:

[quote=“faded vision, post:2, topic:198273”]Depends on the server and the client,

If ur playing a silabsoft server You should
use

client.silabsoft.org
silabsoft.org/client[/quote]

thats just the main client isnt it? its what ive always used. would really like this problem to be sorted its sooo annoying!
thanks for help so far

Read full topic
